ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger Irish cream liqueur
des: "This is the smoothest, tastiest martini I know.  All my friends request this one when we get together.  And it's easy to remember the ingredients and measurements, even after you've had a few . . ."
ins: Combine vodka, chocolate liqueur, Irish cream liqueur, and crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously to chill. Pour into a martini glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry, and serve.
